title: Brotherhood RP ‚Äì Official Rules
subtitle: Respect the RP. Create the Story.
desc: By joining the server, you agree to follow all rules listed below.

cards.title: High RP / NVL
cards.desc:
Always value your life and act realistically even in the worst situations.

‚ùå You run away from a gun pointed at you and act like you‚Äôre not scared.
‚úÖ You negotiate / back off carefully and give fear and pain real weight inside the scene.

cards.title: Force RP / Meta
cards.desc:
You can‚Äôt force an outcome on another player, and you can‚Äôt use out-of-RP information inside RP.

‚úÖ You threaten the player and let them decide how they respond.
‚ùå You tell a player: ‚ÄúGive me the money now, you‚Äôre not allowed to refuse!‚Äù

‚ùå You target someone because you learned their location from Discord.
‚úÖ You gather information inside the city only (seeing / talking / RP radio).

cards.title: Free Kill / Car Kill
cards.desc:
Any killing must have a clear RP reason built on a real scenario ‚Äî not for fun or quick profit.

‚úÖ You enter a meaningful conflict: previous threats / long dispute / clear scenario.
‚ùå You kill someone in the street for no reason like ‚ÄúI just want to test the gun‚Äù.

‚ùå You run someone over to end the fight or escape consequences.
‚úÖ You use your car to escape realistically, without intentional ramming unless the RP is strong and justified.

cards.title: Cop Bait / Interference
cards.desc:
Don‚Äôt provoke police without RP reason, and don‚Äôt jump into a scenario you have no connection to.

‚ùå You drive around the station and shoot just to ‚Äúmake them come‚Äù.
‚úÖ You create a logical RP reason (report / spotted / pursuit due to an actual crime).

‚ùå You interfere in an arrest just to ‚Äúhelp your friends‚Äù.
‚úÖ If you‚Äôre part of the story you join with a clear motive; otherwise you let the scene play out.

cards.title: Combat Log / ALT+F4
cards.desc:
Leaving during an active scenario to avoid consequences is forbidden. You have 5 minutes to return, and you must inform staff if it was a technical issue.

‚ùå You disconnect when police catch you or when you‚Äôre losing a fight.
‚úÖ If you crash / lose connection: you return quickly and explain to staff what happened.

cards.title: Glitch / Cheat
cards.desc:
Abusing glitches or using any cheat / macro = permanent ban, no discussion.

‚ùå You exploit a wall / door / mechanic so you can‚Äôt be caught.
‚úÖ You report it to staff and stop abusing it immediately.

warning.title: Warning
warning.desc: This section is enforced strictly. Record clips whenever possible.

generalCard.title: General Robbery Rules
generalCard.desc:
General Rules:
- Follow the schedule and the required number of participants for each heist.
- Follow staff instructions and respect hostage rules.
- Do not exploit mechanics or game bugs for unfair advantages.
- Any violation may result in a 48-hour ban.

gang.title: Gang Rules
list:
Respect territory & leadership
‚ùå You start a war without going through the leader / coordination.
‚úÖ You coordinate with leadership and respect territory boundaries.

No attacking other gangs without an RP reason
‚ùå You hit a gang just because you want action.
‚úÖ You have a story: revenge / debt / betrayal / a clear ongoing conflict.

Coordination is mandatory
‚ùå You drag your group into a big fight without informing them / without a plan.
‚úÖ You define roles, a fallback point, and communicate in RP.

Cooldown ‚Äî 20 minutes
‚ùå You return to fighting immediately after a major encounter.
‚úÖ You wait 20 minutes of calm before escalating again.

safe.title: Safe Zones
safe.hint: No provoking/criminal actions in these areas.

death.title: Death RP
list:
Do not return to the same scenario immediately
‚ùå You wake up and go back to the same place to take revenge.
‚úÖ You continue your day away from the same event and respect the return timing/conditions.

Memory: forget the people who caused your death and remember context only
‚ùå You say ‚ÄúX is the one who killed me‚Äù and target them again.
‚úÖ You only remember that you were attacked/ambushed without identifying the attackers.

cards.title: Insults (Discord or RP)
cards.desc:
No heavy insults, harassment, or any speech that turns into a personal attack outside RP.

‚ùå You insult/put down a player because you lost to them.
‚úÖ You keep RP calm and if there is an issue, make a report.

cards.title: Parental Insults / TRABRIB / Racism
cards.desc:
Parental insults, TRABRIB, or any racist speech = zero tolerance.

‚ùå Parental insults or racist slurs in voice/chat.
‚úÖ You stay within respect and keep disagreements inside RP in a respectful way.

cards.title: Disrespect (players / police / EMS)
cards.desc:
Keep a respectful attitude with everyone, especially factions (Police/EMS).

‚ùå You mock EMS or sabotage their work.
‚úÖ You cooperate, respond, and let them complete their scenario.

common.title: Common Rules
list:
Police / EMS uniform
Only allowed for assigned members or players with official permission.
Anyone wearing it without rights may receive a warning or punishment.

Clips (Clip)
Required if you have it available during important events or fights.
It helps prove what happened and resolve disputes.

Ignorance of the rules
Not knowing the rules is not an excuse for violations.
All players are responsible for their actions on the server.

WIPE PERSON
Means a full character deletion and starting a new character.
Used only in special cases or by staff request.

Respect other players
No swearing, insults, or any racist language.
Any aggressive behavior without reason will result in punishment.

Force RP & logical RP
All actions in RP must be logical and fit the story.
No killing or threatening players without a clear reason or agreed scenario.

Safe Zones
Recycle ‚Äì Fishing Area ‚Äì Hotel ‚Äì Hospital ‚Äì Weed Lab
No criminal or provoking actions inside these areas.
Violations may lead to punishment or a ban.

Handling disputes
Always try to resolve conflicts through roleplay.
Using force must be justified and logical within the events.

Character control
Do not use glitches or exploit game errors.
Any Combat Log attempt or illegal disengage from fights is forbidden.

Contacting staff
If you have a problem or complaint, contact staff politely and clearly.
Spreading fake news or rumors is forbidden.
